title: App crashes on 1st run after account is created [develop]
body:
### Description

*Type*: Bug

*Summary*: 
app crashes after account is created
#### Expected behavior
can use app after account is created
#### Actual behavior
app crashes after account is created

### Reproduction

- Launch Status for the 1st time after installation
- Create a password in Console
- Wait till account is created and messages with secret phrase etc are shown -> crash

### Log
TestFairy: https://app.testfairy.com/projects/4803622-status/builds/6191633/sessions/1/?accessToken=TzMdnDwUzWqV9TiKMWUgtvhY9oY

[log84.log.txt](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/1177014/log84.log.txt)


* Status version: develop 0.9.8-98-g389e79d6+ 
* Operating System: 
Real device Samsung Galaxy S6, Android 6.0.1
Real device iPhone 6s, iOS 10.2.1
